about_the_game:
This game is chapter based, this is the first chapter of this game!

Features

Joy Land is a first-person horror game that contains puzzles, exploration, investigation and more!
Joy is the one that you always need to count on while playing this game, with her help you can
uncover the mysteries of Joy Land.
You can communicate with her through your special Joy walkie talkie, or what we like to call, The Joy Communicator!
Lewis is the protagonist of this story, he'll try to explore and investigate on what happened to his sister and the many disappearances.
Echo your virtual assistant, she's going to help Lewis too, with giving him an access card for many areas, and she's connected in all of Joy Land's devices, so if Lewis needed some help and Joy wasn't there he knows who to call!


Welcome to Joy Land!

Joy Land is a place to be enJOYed by all ages!
Here, we provide you with the best experiences and memories that'll last forever.
Making our guests happy is a rule we always follow, ensuring that every guest leaves with joy.




JoyBots!


To make the experience more enJOYable, our JoyBots are the best at it!
They're the most fun, smart and joyful robots the world has ever seen.
Our main mascot and symbol, Joy, is a friend for every guest, so if you're lonely you know who to call!
Each JoyBot have their own special charm in this place, so what are you waiting for? come and have FUN!



The Telly .V Show!


How can we forget about Telly? The host with the most!
With Telly .V you can have fun, joy, and even receiving education.
With Mr. V you can be the next winner!!!
So, what are waiting for? Come to Joy Land and sign up TODAY!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600, i5 9400f
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700x, i7 9700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Lewis, an intelligent detective, finds himself on a mission to uncover the truth behind the many disappearances including his sister's. With the help of Joy, Lewis is going to explore what lies behind these walls. only to realize that there's much more to discover than he initially thought.
